review: Fantastic!  The Voice Search works amazingly well.  This one feature alone blows away the competition.  Very well thought out remote control.  Set-up was a breeze.  On screen functions while watching a movie are superb.  No, I don't work for Amazon!

review: this was a birthday gift it stopped working the very next day HoweverAmazon was quick to replace it for us and I have had 0 Problems with this oneI really like the layout and being able to talk to it and have it find what I'm looking for.It's quick and responsive, easy to setup and having Amazon Prime just gives us more choices.
author: susan

review: Wonderful product and super easy to install - even for me!!!  I still have to get a little more familiar with it, but, I watched three movies so far and an entire TV series.  The selection process was very easy.  I wish the menu was more like TIVO so I wouldn't have to learn another system.......  My kids love it as well and don't seem to care that it's a new system to learn - they took to it like a fish in water.  Well worth the money.  The picture is clear and there is NO buffering problems.  The entire movie/TV series pays without any hesitation and starts right away - without all the annoying previews or commercials.
author: Ruger

review: Fantastic!  I have had a Roku for several years.  The Amazon Fire TV is much better.  I love the experience!!
